verses.verse: Nevertheless <S%H3588><s%> the dimness <S%H4155><s%> shall not be such as was in her vexation, <S%H4164><s%> when <S%H6256><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%> he lightly <S%H7043><s%> afflicted <S%H7043><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and afterward <S%H314><s%> did more grievously <S%H3513><s%> afflict <S%H3513><s%> her by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> that walked <S%H1980><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> light: <S%H216><s%> they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death, <S%H6757><s%> on them has the light <S%H216><s%> shined. <S%H5050><s%>

You have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> the nation, <S%H1471><s%> and not increased <S%H1431><s%> the joy: <S%H8057><s%> they joy <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you according to the joy <S%H8055><s%> in harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and as men rejoice <S%H1523><s%> when they divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil. <S%H7998><s%>

For you have broken <S%H2865><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of his burden, <S%H5448><s%> and the staff <S%H4294><s%> of his shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his oppressor, <S%H5065><s%> as in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

For every <S%H3605><s%> battle <S%H5430><s%> of the warrior <S%H5431><s%> is with confused <S%H7494><s%> noise, and garments <S%H8071><s%> rolled <S%H1556><s%> in blood; <S%H1818><s%> but this shall be with burning <S%H8316><s%> and fuel <S%H3980><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

For to us a child <S%H3206><s%> is born, <S%H3205><s%> to us a son <S%H1121><s%> is given: <S%H5414><s%> and the government <S%H4951><s%> shall be on his shoulder: <S%H7926><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> Wonderful, <S%H6382><s%> Counselor, <S%H3289><s%> The mighty <S%H1368><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> The everlasting <S%H5703><s%> Father, <S%H1><s%> The Prince <S%H8269><s%> of Peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Of the increase <S%H4768><s%> of his government <S%H4951><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> there shall be no <S%H369><s%> end, <S%H7093><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and on his kingdom, <S%H4467><s%> to order <S%H3559><s%> it, and to establish <S%H5582><s%> it with judgment <S%H4941><s%> and with justice <S%H6666><s%> from now on <S%H6258><s%> even for ever. <S%H5769><s%> The zeal <S%H7068><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> will perform <S%H6213><s%> this. <S%H2063><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> into Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and it has lighted <S%H5307><s%> on Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall know, <S%H3045><s%> even Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> that say <S%H559><s%> in the pride <S%H1346><s%> and stoutness <S%H1433><s%> of heart, <S%H3824><s%>

The bricks <S%H3843><s%> are fallen <S%H5307><s%> down, but we will build <S%H1129><s%> with hewn <S%H1496><s%> stones: <S%H1496><s%> the sycomores <S%H8256><s%> are cut <S%H1438><s%> down, <S%H1438><s%> but we will change <S%H2498><s%> them into cedars. <S%H730><s%>
Therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall set <S%H7682><s%> up the adversaries <S%H6862><s%> of Rezin <S%H7526><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, and join <S%H5526><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> together;

The Syrians <S%H758><s%> before, <S%H6924><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> behind; <S%H268><s%> and they shall devour <S%H398><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with open <S%H3605><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned <S%H7725><s%> away, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched <S%H5186><s%> out still. <S%H5750><s%>
For the people <S%H5971><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> not to him that smites <S%H5221><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> do they seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will cut <S%H3772><s%> off from Israel <S%H3478><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> and tail, <S%H2180><s%> branch <S%H3712><s%> and rush, <S%H100><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The ancient <S%H2204><s%> and honorable, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H6440><s%> he is the head; <S%H7218><s%> and the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that teaches <S%H3384><s%> lies, <S%H8267><s%> he is the tail. <S%H2180><s%>
For the leaders <S%H833><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> cause them to err; <S%H8582><s%> and they that are led <S%H833><s%> of them are destroyed. <S%H1104><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the LORD <S%H136><s%> shall have no <S%H3808><s%> joy <S%H8055><s%> in their young <S%H970><s%> men, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on their fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widows: <S%H490><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> one is an hypocrite <S%H2611><s%> and an evildoer, <S%H7489><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> folly. <S%H5039><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned <S%H7725><s%> away, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched <S%H5186><s%> out still. <S%H5750><s%>

For wickedness <S%H7564><s%> burns <S%H1197><s%> as the fire: <S%H784><s%> it shall devour <S%H398><s%> the briers <S%H8068><s%> and thorns, <S%H7898><s%> and shall kindle <S%H3341><s%> in the thickets <S%H5442><s%> of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> and they shall mount <S%H55><s%> up like the lifting <S%H1348><s%> up of smoke. <S%H6227><s%>

Through the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> darkened, <S%H6272><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall be as the fuel <S%H3980><s%> of the fire: <S%H784><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall spare <S%H2550><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>

And he shall snatch <S%H1504><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and be hungry; <S%H7456><s%> and he shall eat <S%H398><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H8040><s%> and they shall not be satisfied: <S%H7646><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his own arm: <S%H2220><s%>

Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> and they together <S%H3162><s%> shall be against <S%H5921><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> is not turned <S%H7725><s%> away, but his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched <S%H5186><s%> out still. <S%H5750><s%>
